text: Jazz & Bossa is a studio album by American jazz bassist Ron Carter released on July 15, 2008 via Blue Note label. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== *Ron Carter – bass, producer, composer (tracks 3 4 6 7 9) *Portinho – drums *Guilherme Monteiro – guitar *Rolando Morales-Matos – percussion *Stephen Scott – piano *Javon Jackson – tenor saxophone == References == Category:Ron Carter albums Category:2008 albums Category:Blue Note Records albums
title: Jazz & Bossa
